<style>
		div#ew-responsive-image-gallery_{!-SHAPEINDEX-!} *  {
			box-sizing: border-box;
		}

		div#ew-responsive-image-gallery_{!-SHAPEINDEX-!} {
			margin: 0;
			padding: 0 {!-plrigControlPadding-!}px 0 {!-plrigControlPadding-!}px;
		}
		div#ew-responsive-image-gallery_{!-SHAPEINDEX-!} div.rig-img-container img {
			
			vertical-align: middle;
			width: 100%; 
			{!-plrigGalleryStyle(Masonry)//height: auto;//plrigGalleryStyle-!}
			{!-plrigGalleryStyle(!Masonry)//height: 100%;//plrigGalleryStyle-!}
			{!-plrigGalleryStyle(!Masonry)//{!-plrigGalleryStyle-!}//plrigGalleryStyle-!}
			{--IMAGE-SHADOW--}	
		}

		div#ew-responsive-image-gallery_{!-SHAPEINDEX-!} div.column {
			padding: 0 0;
			}
			
			
		div#ew-responsive-image-gallery_{!-SHAPEINDEX-!} div.row div.rig-img-container {
			{!-plrigGalleryStyle(!Masonry)//height: 100%;//plrigGalleryStyle-!}
			padding: {!-plrigImageSpacing-!}px;
			text-align: center;
		}
		
		p.ew-caption-settings-{!-SHAPEINDEX-!} {
			font-family: {!-%fontfamilycss-!};
			font-size: {!-%fontsize-!}px;
			
		}
		div#ew-responsive-image-gallery_{!-SHAPEINDEX-!} div.ew-caption {
			display:none;
		}
		
		
		{!-plrigGalleryStyle(Masonry)//
		
			div#ew-responsive-image-gallery_{!-SHAPEINDEX-!} .row {
				display: -ms-flexbox; /* IE10 */
				display: flex;
				flex-direction: row;
				-ms-flex-wrap: wrap; /* IE10 */
				flex-wrap: wrap;
			
			}
		
			{!-plgrMasonryStyleInfo-!}
			
		//plrigGalleryStyle-!}
		
		{!-plrigGalleryStyle(!Masonry)//
		
			div#ew-responsive-image-gallery_{!-SHAPEINDEX-!} { 
			  display: -ms-flexbox;
			  display: -webkit-box;
			  display: flex;
  
			  -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
			  -ms-flex-direction: row;
			  -webkit-flex-flow: row wrap; 
			  flex-flow: row wrap; 
 
			}
			div#ew-responsive-image-gallery_{!-SHAPEINDEX-!} div.row { 
			  -webkit-box-flex: auto;
			  -ms-flex: auto;
			  flex: auto;
			  width: {!-plrigGalleryColumns-!};
			  min-width:{!-plrigMinImageWidth-!}px; 
			}			
		//plrigGalleryStyle-!}
		
    </style>
    {!-plrigClickToOpenSlideshow(TRUE)//<script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function(){
            $('#ew-responsive-image-gallery_{!-SHAPEINDEX-!}').lightGallery({
            	selector: '.ewi-item{!-SHAPEINDEX-!}',
            	subHtmlSelectorRelative: true,
            	autoplay: {!-plrigAutoPlay-!},
            	pause: {!-plrigSlideShowSpeed-!},
            	mode: 'lg-{!-plrigTransition-!}',
            	speed: {!-plrigTransitionSpeed-!},
            	counter: {!-plrigShowCounter-!},
            	thumbnail: {!-plrigShowThumbnails-!},
            	controls: {!-plrigShowImageNav-!},
            	download: {!-plrigShowDownload-!},
            	share: {!-plrigShowShowShare-!}

            });
        });
     </script>//plrigClickToOpenSlideshow-!}
